abstract: How to use text messaging with social networks.
snippet: How to use text messaging with social networks.
lead_paragraph: Dedicated smartphone apps for social-media networks make it easy to post status updates on the go. Users with regular cellphones can also keep their friends in the loop by simply sending text messages directly to a phone number specified by the site. A few setup steps may be needed first to get the text-based posting activated (and every service may not work with every wireless carrier out there), but Facebook, Twitter and Google+ all have guides for getting started.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Mobile Updates to Your Social Network
